BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Application No. 20175118 HAX submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development pursuant to Article V and Article XI of the Private Housing Finance Law for approval of an amendment to a previously approved plan and project, the leasing of the property from the current owner to the lessee, and a real property tax exemption for property located at Block 2724, Lot 103 and part of Lot 5, Borough of the Bronx, Community Board 2, Council District 17.
